channel.title: 4th" on Robotics - Math - Computer Coding - Chess in Charlottesville
channel.description: Recent content in 4th" on Robotics - Math - Computer Coding - Chess in Charlottesville

item.title: 1-Day Camp; Apr 18, 2025 | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Join us for an exhilarating exploration of robotics, coding, chess, and math. Teamwork and collaboration are at the heart of our camp experience. Students will have the opportunity to work together, share ideas, and solve challenges. Through hands-on activities and group projects, students will develop critical thinking skills and learn the importance of effective communication.

item.title: Math Boost | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: This class is tailored for students who are in the top half of the class, but need clarifications of some grade-level concepts. It offers reinforcement of key concepts through extra practice with typical grade-level problems, ensuring that students can grasp and master the material at their own pace. Additionally, students will have the opportunity to work on materials recommended by their classroom teacher and tackle problems suggested by Blue Ridge Boost instructors, providing a tailored and comprehensive approach to meet their individual learning needs.

item.title: Math Excellence | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: In our advanced math class, we harness the engaging and comprehensive materials from Beast Academy to cultivate a deep understanding and passion for mathematics. Each student embarks on a personalized mathematical journey under the guidance of an expert Blue Ridge Boost instructor. Class Structure Introduction: Each session begins with a concise lesson introducing new concepts and exercise types. Guided Practice: Students then apply these concepts through hands-on problem-solving, with instructor support readily available.

item.title: Math Mastery | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: This advanced mathematics class is designed for curious students ranking in the top of their class who are eager to explore math beyond the typical school curriculum. Utilizing the renowned Dimensions Singapore Math curriculum, our year-long program emphasizes deep conceptual understanding, critical thinking, problem-solving strategies, and practical application of mathematical principles. Key Features: Advanced Mental Math Strategies: Students will be introduced to various mental math techniques to improve their calculation skills.

Robotics with Lego Spike | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Jump into the world of robotics and coding with the LEGO Education SPIKE Prime system! This hands-on course introduces students to the exciting possibilities of robotics engineering and computational thinking through engaging, project-based learning. Designed for beginners to intermediate learners, this course will teach students how to design, build, and program robotic solutions to solve real-world challenges. In this course, students will: Learn the basics of robotics using the LEGO SPIKE Prime kit.

item.title: Scratch Coding | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Come and learn to code your own games in Scratch! Each session will create a new game.

item.title: Spring Break Camp | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Python coding in the morning and Lego Robotics in the afternoon.
